name.fr: Gestionnaire de mots de passe WALLIX Vault

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At home, at work, or on the go, WALLIX Vault easily secures all your passwords, passkeys, and sensitive information
short.fr: Chez vous, au travail, n'importe où, WALLIX Vault sécurise mots de passe, clés d'accès et informations sensibles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wallix Enterprise Vault allows users to store their credentials in a secure store, that is synchronized between all devices and protected using end-to-end encryption.
